remarks:
Membership in the union of the range of a function.  See ~ elunirnALT for a shorter proof which uses ~ ax-pow .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2006.) 

---

 Membership in the union of the range of a function.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2006.)
statement:
elunirn $p |- ( Fun F -> ( A e. U. ran F <-> E. x e. dom F A e. ( F ` x ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
